name: @haopoboy/skipper-s3
description: Ahead merged version from official skipper-s3

scripts.custom-tests: node -e "require('skipper-adapter-tests')({mocha: { timeout: 360000 }, module: require('./'), bucket:process.env.BUCKET || 'skipper-adapter-tests', key: process.env.KEY, secret: process.env.SECRET});"
scripts.lint: eslint . --max-warnings=0 --ignore-pattern 'test/' && echo 'âœ”  Your code looks good.'
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run custom-tests && npm run bench
scripts.bench: node -e "console.log('There are no additional performance benchmarks yet.')"

author: Mike McNeil
